name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Applai: AI job application copilot and ghost writer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your AI job application ghost writer - cover letters and job applications tailored to your experience and in your writing style

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WHAT IS APPLAI
Your dream job advert + your resume + samples of your professional writing (optional) + Applai = an authentic and bespoke cover letter or job application within seconds.

Use Applai to multiply your job application productivity, increasing the quality and quantity of your applications to get that dream job sooner!


HOW DOES IT WORK?
Applai first analyses how your skills and experience fit the job you want, then creates an editable plan of how it will write your job application. This gives you have a high level of control over the content and structure of your application - much more so than simply asking ChatGPT to "write me a cover letter for this job". 

Applai can also use samples of your professional writing to authentically mirror your writing style and avoiding obvious AI-sounding generations. By understand your unique voice, Applai can compose sentences in a way that mimics your vocabulary, diction, tone and syntax.

With these techniques available in a few clicks from the Chrome side panel you can easily create coherent and impactful job applications presenting the talents and experience you offer.


PRIVACY & SECURITY  
At Applai, weâ€™re committed to protecting your privacy. The information we gather or process is used strictly to grow your career, and speed up and better your job search. Your information is not, will not and has not been sold to third parties. 

More information on privacy and security can be found on our website: 
https://www.applai.app/legal/privacy-policy
https://www.applai.app/legal/terms


HELP & CONTACT
